name: Undisclosed Gift Giver
description:
It's time for your office's mandatory Secret Santa event. Rather unluckily, you picked your boss as your gift recipient. Your gift selection could benefit or harm your career.

Keys to Becoming an Executive Gift Giver
  • Navigate office politics via first-person, tile-based movement.
  • Talk to co-workers to discover clues to the perfect gift – be careful to sort good advice from bad advice or just plain guesswork.
  • Use the clues to select a gift from the Buy-O-Tron vending machine at the rear of the office.
  • Give your gift to your boss and accept your fate.

Every visit to the office randomizes the correct gift, available gifts, and dialogue clues.

Controls
  • W/D – Move Forward/Back
  • A/S – Turn Left/Turn Right
  • Spacebar – Interact/Advance Line of Dialogue/Use Inventory on Object
  • I Key – Open/Close Inventory
  • Bracket Keys ([ and ]) - Scroll Through Inventory
  • F1 – Toggle In-Game Sound Options Menu
  • F2 – Toggle In-Game Dialogue Box Color Menu
  • ESC – Return to Main Menu

Made with Unity Personal Edition 5.6.6.f2
